thread.title: Michelle Bridges' ex Bill Moore marries new love Lisa | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Michelle Bridges' ex Bill Moore marries new love Lisa | Daily Mail Online

author: Jade Watkins For Daily Mail Australia
title: Michelle Bridges' ex Bill Moore marries new love Lisa | Daily Mail Online
text: He might still be best friends with his famous ex Michelle Bridges, but Bill Moore has well and truly moved on from the former Biggest Loser trainer. Bill married his longtime love Lisa in a romantic ceremony in Sydney, last month. The brunette beauty bride wrote a gushing thank you to all of her family and friends on Facebook following the Australia Day ceremony in the couple's home. Moving on: Michelle Bridges' ex, Bill Moore, has married his longtime love Lisa in a romantic ceremony on Australia Day 'What a beautiful few days we have had celebrating our wedding with family and friends. Thank you so much to everyone who joined us in person and to all who joined us in loving support and spirit,' she wrote. The bride, who looks a lot like Michelle with her fit figure, good looks and brunette locks, was stunning in a form-fitting one-shouldered white gown by Australian designer Toni Maticevski teamed with matching white stilettos from Ted Baker. She had her chocolate tresses coiffed in soft waves around her face and carried a bouquet of cream roses. The couple then celebrated with a cocktail party on Saturday, where the bride wore another designer dress, this time by Dion Lee, along with La Perla heels. Designer wedding day: The bride stunned in a form-fitting one-shouldered white gown by Australian designer Toni Maticevski teamed with matching white stilettos from Ted Baker Past love: Bill, a fellow fitness trainer and gym owner was married to The Biggest Loser coach Michelle for nine years before they announced their separation in May, 2013 After saying 'I do', the couple honeymooned in Tasmania, with Lisa once again taking to Facebook to post a cute snap of the pair. 'Hi everyone, here is a little snippet of our wonderful honeymoon in Tasmania. We just wanted to say we both feel overwhelmed with the love and generosity that everyone has blessed our marriage with,' she wrote. 'Thank you to everyone for the beautiful gifts that we look forward to sharing with you. Much love ❤️ from Billy and Lisa xxxx' Happy couple: The pair pose up for a loved-up snap during a trip to Europe Honeymoon: After saying 'I do', the couple honeymooned in Tasmania Bill - who remained Michelle's business manager until recently - is now the CEO of Fitness Australia, after years as a personal trainer and gym owner. He was married to The Biggest Loser coach Michelle for nine years before they announced their separation in May, 2013. While she moved on with Steve 'The Commando' Willis a few months later, the only other woman Bill has been linked to since their split was Michelle herself, with the pair regularly attending red carpet events together. Michelle and Commando's on and off relationship was revealed in 2013, with Commando even attempting to reunite with his wife Froso (whom he has two children with and an elder daughter from a previous relationship) before ending up back with Michelle. Michelle and Commando now have a child together, Axel, one. In fact, Michelle has even been playing the role of stepmother to The Commando's eldest daughter Briana, 14, spending some quality family time together. Still friends: Following their split Michelle and Bill remain good friends Share or comment on this article 111
